typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ENTITY_ID as string,
		FI_INSTRUMENT_ID as string,
		ASOF_DT as timestamp,
		PF_SYSTEM_CODE as string,
		PF_SRC_SYSTEM_ID as string,
		BRANCH_ID as string,
		ORG_UNIT_ID as string,
		CUST_ID as string,
		CHANNEL_ID as string,
		ACCOUNT_ID as string,
		PRODUCT_ID as string,
		GL_ACCOUNT as string,
		PRODUCT as string,
		GL_CODE as string,
		TRANSACTION_DT as timestamp,
		FI_START_DATE as timestamp,
		FI_END_DATE as timestamp,
		CURRENCY_CD_TC as string,
		CURRENCY_CD_FC as string,
		FI_BALANCE_AMT_TC as decimal(19,4),
		FI_BALANCE_AMT_FC as decimal(19,4),
		FI_TERM_MATURITY as integer,
		FI_TERM_UOM as string,
		RATE_RESET_TYPE as string,
		FI_INTEREST_RATE as decimal(18,0),
		FI_FLOOR_RATE as decimal(18,0),
		BU_CODE as string,
		TENOR_MONTHS as integer,
		CLOSED_DATE as timestamp,
		LAST_REPRICING_DATE as timestamp,
		NEXT_REPRICING_DATE as timestamp,
		REPRICING_FREQ as integer,
		REG_LOAN_GRADE as string,
		HO_LOAN_GRADE as string,
		NPL_BORROWER_IND as string,
		BASE_RATE_TYPE as string,
		INTEREST_SPREAD_RATE as decimal(18,0),
		NON_STD_FTP_RATE as decimal(18,0),
		ACCT_STATUS_CODE as string,
		LOAN_INDICATOR as string,
		SUSPEND_INTEREST_IND as string,
		TRANS_POINT_ID as string,
		CUST_NAME_ENGLISH as string,
		BU_CODE_DERIVE as string,
		CUST_RM_CODE as string,
		ACCT_RM_CODE as string,
		PRODUCT_SOURCE_ID as string,
		GL_ACCOUNT_EOP as string,
		GL_ACCOUNT_AVE as string,
		GL_ACCOUNT_INT as string,
		GL_ACCOUNT_FTP as string,
		GL_ACCOUNT_OBS as string,
		OPEN_DATE as timestamp,
		MATURITY_DATE as timestamp,
		BALANCE_EOP_AMT_TC as decimal(19,4),
		BALANCE_EOP_AMT_FC as decimal(19,4),
		INTEREST_AMT_TC as decimal(19,4),
		INTEREST_AMT_FC as decimal(19,4),
		FTP_AMT_TC as decimal(19,4),
		FTP_AMT_FC as decimal(19,4),
		FTP_RATE as decimal(18,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> FiInstSTG
source(output(
		ENTITY_ID as string,
		FISCAL_YEAR as integer,
		ACCOUNTING_PERIOD as integer,
		PF_SCENARIO_ID as string,
		ASOF_DT as timestamp,
		CURRENCY_CD_FC as string,
		SETID as string,
		ARCHIVE_FOR_YEAR as integer,
		ARCHIVE_FOR_PERIOD as integer,
		CPMS_SOURCE_DATA_DIR_PATH as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RunControlTbl
source(output(
		ENTITY_ID as string,
		SOURCE_ID as string,
		DESCR as string,
		SEQ_NO as integer,
		PROCESS_INSTANCE as integer,
		DESCRLONG as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ProcessInstanceTbl
source(output(
		SRC_SYSTEM_ID as string,
		SRC_DATE as string,
		ACCOUNT_NUMBER as string,
		SRC_AMOUNT_TYPE as string,
		ACCT_AMOUNT_ORIG_CURR as decimal(19,4),
		ORIG_ACCT_AMOUNT_CURR as string,
		BU_CODE as string,
		SOURCE_PROD_CODE as string,
		ACCT_RM_CODE as string,
		ACCT_AMOUNT_CNY as decimal(19,4),
		TENOR_MONTHS as integer,
		TENOR_DAYS as integer,
		OPEN_DATE as timestamp,
		CLOSED_DATE as timestamp,
		EFFECTIVE_DATE as timestamp,
		MATURITY_DATE as timestamp,
		LAST_REPRICING_DATE as timestamp,
		NEXT_REPRICING_DATE as timestamp,
		REPRICING_FREQ as integer,
		CUST_NUMBER as string,
		REG_LOAN_GRADE as string,
		HO_LOAN_GRADE as string,
		NPL_BORROWER_IND as string,
		BASE_RATE as decimal(18,0),
		BASE_RATE_TYPE as string,
		FINANCIAL_CAT_CODE as string,
		FINANCIAL_CAT_DESCR as string,
		INTEREST_SPREAD_RATE as decimal(18,0),
		NON_STD_FTP_RATE as decimal(18,0),
		ACCT_RATE_TYPE as string,
		ACCT_STATUS_CODE as string,
		ACCT_OUTSTAND_BAL as decimal(19,4),
		LOAN_INDICATOR as string,
		SUSPEND_INTEREST_IND as string,
		BRANCH_ID as string,
		CUST_NAME_ENGLISH as string,
		CUST_RM_CODE as string,
		ACCT_CURRENCY_CODE as string,
		NEXT_ROLLOVER_DATE as timestamp,
		NEXT_TERM_MATURITY_DATE as timestamp,
		CONV_ACCT_AMOUNT as decimal(19,4),
		LAST_ROLLOVER_DATE as timestamp,
		FI_INTEREST_RATE as decimal(18,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> FiAvgbal
source(output(
		SETID as string,
		ACCOUNT_ID as string,
		ACCOUNT_DESC as string,
		ACCOUNT_TYPE as string,
		ACCOUNT_TYPE_DESC as string,
		ML_ACCOUNT_ID as string,
		ACC_LEVEL_1_ID as string,
		ACC_LEVEL_2_ID as string,
		ACC_LEVEL_3_ID as string,
		ACC_LEVEL_4_ID as string,
		ACC_LEVEL_5_ID as string,
		ACC_LEVEL_6_ID as string,
		ACC_LEVEL_1_DESC as string,
		ACC_LEVEL_2_DESC as string,
		ACC_LEVEL_3_DESC as string,
		ACC_LEVEL_4_DESC as string,
		ACC_LEVEL_5_DESC as string,
		ACC_LEVEL_6_DESC as string,
		ABC_ACCOUNT_FLG as string,
		GL_ACCOUNT_FLG as string,
		ML_ACCOUNT_FLG as string,
		IL_ACCOUNT_FLG as string,
		BALANCE_FWD_FLG as string,
		ABC_OBJ_TYPE as string,
		ABC_OBJ_ID as string,
		SIGNED_VALUE as string,
		SOURCE_ACCT_TYPE as string,
		EFFDT as timestamp,
		EFF_STATUS as string,
		PROCESS_INSTANCE as string,
		LOAD_DTTM as timestamp,
		LASTUPDDTTM as timestamp,
		OPR_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AccountDim
Join2, RunControlTbl join(FiInstSTG@ENTITY_ID == RunControlTbl@ENTITY_ID
	&& FiInstSTG@ASOF_DT == RunControlTbl@ASOF_DT,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> FiInstrJoinRunControl
FiInstrJoinRunControl, FiAvgbalFilter join(PF_SRC_SYSTEM_ID == SRC_SYSTEM_ID
	&& FI_INSTRUMENT_ID == ACCOUNT_NUMBER,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> FinInstrJoinFiAvgbal
FiAvgbal alterRow(insertIf(SRC_AMOUNT_TYPE=='26 , 76'),
	insertIf(ACCT_AMOUNT_ORIG_CURR!=0)) ~> FiAvgbalFilter
ProcessInstanceTbl alterRow(insertIf(SOURCE_ID=='PSI')) ~> ProcessInstanceFilter
FiInstSTG alterRow(insertIf(SUSPEND_INTEREST_IND=='N'),
	insertIf(GL_ACCOUNT!='NA')) ~> FiInstrFilter
FinInstrJoinFiAvgbal, ProcessInstanceFilter join(FiInstSTG@ENTITY_ID == ProcessInstanceTbl@ENTITY_ID
	&& AccountDim@PROCESS_INSTANCE == ProcessInstanceTbl@PROCESS_INSTANCE,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 derive(FI_BALANCE_AMT_RC = isNull('FI_BALANCE_AMT_RC')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		ENTITY_ID = FiInstSTG@ENTITY_ID,
		FI_INSTRUMENT_ID,
		FISCAL_YEAR = FiInstSTG@FISCAL_YEAR,
		ACCOUNTING_PERIOD = FiInstSTG@ACCOUNTING_PERIOD,
		PF_SCENARIO_ID,
		ACCOUNT_ID = FiInstSTG@ACCOUNT_ID,
		SOURCE_ID,
		GL_ACCOUNT,
		PRODUCT,
		BRANCH_ID = FiInstSTG@BRANCH_ID,
		ORG_UNIT_ID,
		CUST_ID,
		PRODUCT_SOURCE_ID,
		PRODUCT_ID,
		CHANNEL_ID,
		GL_CODE,
		CURRENCY_CD_TC,
		FI_START_DATE,
		FI_END_DATE,
		CURRENCY_CD_TC,
		CURRENCY_CD_FC = FiInstSTG@CURRENCY_CD_FC,
		FI_BALANCE_AMT_TC,
		FI_BALANCE_AMT_FC,
		FI_BALANCE_AMT_RC,
		PROCESS_INSTANCE = ProcessInstanceTbl@PROCESS_INSTANCE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
FiInstrFilter, AccountDim join(FiInstSTG@ACCOUNT_ID == AccountDim@ACCOUNT_ID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Select1 sink(input(
		ENTITY_ID as string,
		FI_INSTRUMENT_ID as string,
		FISCAL_YEAR as integer,
		ACCOUNTING_PERIOD as integer,
		PF_SCENARIO_ID as string,
		ACCOUNT_ID as string,
		SOURCE_ID as string,
		GL_ACCOUNT as string,
		PRODUCT as string,
		BRANCH_ID as string,
		ORG_UNIT_ID as string,
		CUST_ID as string,
		PRODUCT_SOURCE_ID as string,
		PRODUCT_ID as string,
		CHANNEL_ID as string,
		GL_CODE as string,
		CURRENCY_CD_TC as string,
		CURRENCY_CD_FC as string,
		FI_BALANCE_AMT_TC as decimal(18,0),
		FI_BALANCE_AMT_FC as decimal(18,0),
		FI_BALANCE_AMT_RC as decimal(18,0),
		PROCESS_INSTANCE as decimal(18,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ENTITY_ID,
		FI_INSTRUMENT_ID,
		PF_SCENARIO_ID,
		ACCOUNT_ID,
		SOURCE_ID,
		GL_ACCOUNT,
		PRODUCT,
		BRANCH_ID,
		ORG_UNIT_ID,
		CUST_ID,
		PRODUCT_SOURCE_ID,
		PRODUCT_ID,
		CHANNEL_ID,
		GL_CODE,
		CURRENCY_CD_TC,
		CURRENCY_CD_FC,
		FI_BALANCE_AMT_TC,
		FI_BALANCE_AMT_FC,
		PROCESS_INSTANCE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
